Name: My Hidden Things
About the game: In the beginning there was nothing, only a chaos of dreams, out of which came Xary. He tried to understand people's nature and help them. Yet he is too young. And here you are. Together, you need to figure this all outâ€¦ This is an adventure hidden object game with non-trivial mechanics. What you need to do is not only to just search for items but also to move them in order to reveal the wanted ones. The game story is based on the dreams of several people who are helped by Xary and the player to overcome difficulties and stay human. The story is presented in comics. Cute but scary story. Find and connect items. Listen to nice music. Solve all the puzzles!
